developers.name: Yein Christina Park
developers.desc: Christina is studying Chemistry and Physics at Harvard College.

developers.name: Eric Sun
developers.desc: Eric is an undergraduate at Harvard College likely concentrating in Chemical and Physical Biology with a master's in Applied Mathematics. He hails from Pueblo, Colorado and has a neat box turtle named Tooty.

developers.name: Yi H Chen
developers.desc: Yi an undergraduate at Harvard College, class of 2020 studying Chemical and Physical Biology. She is currently working at the Murray Lab studying genetic instability in the cell cycle, using S. cerevisiae as a model. She is from NYC.
